title: Pricing
description: We built Numeral to be the easiest way for ecommerce entrepreneurs to handle sales tax.

data.html:
Simple & honest pricing.

No long-term contract needed. You'll pay for registration and filing.

<style>

.v3_customer-logos-marquee-group {
  animation: marquee 75s linear infinite;
}

.v3_customer-logos-marquee-group.small {
  animation: marquee 140s linear infinite;
}

@keyframes marquee {
  0% {
    transform: translateX(0);
  }
  100% {
    transform: translateX(calc(-100% - 5rem));
  }
}

@media screen and (max-width: 767px) {

  
  .v3_customer-logos-marquee-wrapper:not(.small) .v3_customer-logos-marquee-group img {
    height: 1.125rem;
  }

}

</style>


<script>


// >> SOLUTIONS PAGE - SHOW RELEVANT LOGO GROUP BY URL PATH (Variant must be "Base")
const urlPathSegments = window.location.pathname.split("/").filter(segment => segment !== "");
const lastUrlPathSegment = urlPathSegments[urlPathSegments.length - 1];

switch(lastUrlPathSegment) {
  case 'ecommerce':
    document.querySelector('.v3_customer-logos-marquee-logos.ecommerce').style.display = 'flex';
    document.querySelector('.v3_customer-logos-marquee-logos.global').style.display = 'none';
    document.querySelector('.v3_customer-logos-marquee-logos.saas').style.display = 'none';
  break;
  case 'global':
    document.querySelector('.v3_customer-logos-marquee-logos.ecommerce').style.display = 'none';
    document.querySelector('.v3_customer-logos-marquee-logos.global').style.display = 'flex';
    document.querySelector('.v3_customer-logos-marquee-logos.saas').style.display = 'none';
  break;
  case 'saas':
    document.querySelector('.v3_customer-logos-marquee-logos.ecommerce').style.display = 'none';
    document.querySelector('.v3_customer-logos-marquee-logos.global').style.display = 'none';
    document.querySelector('.v3_customer-logos-marquee-logos.saas').style.display = 'flex';
  break;
  default:
    document.querySelector('.v3_customer-logos-marquee-logos.ecommerce').style.display = 'none';
    document.querySelector('.v3_customer-logos-marquee-logos.global').style.display = 'flex';
    document.querySelector('.v3_customer-logos-marquee-logos.saas').style.display = 'none';
}


// << SOLUTIONS PAGE - SHOW RELEVANT LOGO GROUP BY URL PATH (Variant must be "Base")


// Duplicate logo group
const customerLogosMarqueeGroup = document.querySelector('.v3_customer-logos-marquee-group');
const clonedCustomerLogosMarqueeGroup = customerLogosMarqueeGroup.cloneNode(true);
clonedCustomerLogosMarqueeGroup.id = 'clonedCustomerLogosMarqueeGroup';
customerLogosMarqueeGroup.parentNode.insertBefore(clonedCustomerLogosMarqueeGroup, customerLogosMarqueeGroup);


</script>

.v3_customer-logos-marquee-group {

}

}

@keyframes marquee {

}

  .v3_customer-logos-marquee-wrapper:not(.small) .v3_customer-logos-marquee-group img {

<script>


// >> SOLUTIONS PAGE - SHOW RELEVANT LOGO GROUP BY URL PATH (Variant must be "Base")
const urlPathSegments = window.location.pathname.split("/").filter(segment => segment !== "");
const lastUrlPathSegment = urlPathSegments[urlPathSegments.length - 1];

switch(lastUrlPathSegment) {
  case 'ecommerce':
    document.querySelector('.v3_customer-logos-marquee-logos.ecommerce').style.display = 'flex';
    document.querySelector('.v3_customer-logos-marquee-logos.global').style.display = 'none';
    document.querySelector('.v3_customer-logos-marquee-logos.saas').style.display = 'none';
  break;
  case 'global':
    document.querySelector('.v3_customer-logos-marquee-logos.ecommerce').style.display = 'none';
    document.querySelector('.v3_customer-logos-marquee-logos.global').style.display = 'flex';
    document.querySelector('.v3_customer-logos-marquee-logos.saas').style.display = 'none';
  break;
  case 'saas':
    document.querySelector('.v3_customer-logos-marquee-logos.ecommerce').style.display = 'none';
    document.querySelector('.v3_customer-logos-marquee-logos.global').style.display = 'none';
    document.querySelector('.v3_customer-logos-marquee-logos.saas').style.display = 'flex';
  break;
  default:
    document.querySelector('.v3_customer-logos-marquee-logos.ecommerce').style.display = 'none';
    document.querySelector('.v3_customer-logos-marquee-logos.global').style.display = 'flex';
    document.querySelector('.v3_customer-logos-marquee-logos.saas').style.display = 'none';
}


// << SOLUTIONS PAGE - SHOW RELEVANT LOGO GROUP BY URL PATH (Variant must be "Base")


// Duplicate logo group
const customerLogosMarqueeGroup = document.querySelector('.v3_customer-logos-marquee-group');
const clonedCustomerLogosMarqueeGroup = customerLogosMarqueeGroup.cloneNode(true);
clonedCustomerLogosMarqueeGroup.id = 'clonedCustomerLogosMarqueeGroup';
customerLogosMarqueeGroup.parentNode.insertBefore(clonedCustomerLogosMarqueeGroup, customerLogosMarqueeGroup);


</script>

data.html:
Frequently asked questions

Let’s set your mind at ease.

Can’t find the answer you’re looking for? Reach out to our customer support team.

Is pricing really this simple?

There are a few states that require a registration fee; however, most states are free. The only recurring charge is your monthly, quarterly, or annual filings. For Pro (custom) plans, please schedule a time with a member of our team.

Can Numeral help me with back taxes?

Yes, we’ll complete a full audit of your store and discuss your options. We can help initiate a Voluntary Disclosure Agreement (VDA) or suggest alternatives like backfiling.

Do we have to sign a long-term contract?

Clients pay month to month when we file taxes and/or register them in a state.

What assurances does Numeral make for clients?

We guarantee that your sales tax is filed on time, or we'll pay for your penalties and interest charges.

What’s the general timeline and next steps to get sales tax compliant?

We’ll complete a comprehensive audit of your business. Based on our results, we can help register your business in the appropriate states and backfile your sales tax. It often takes just a few days to get fully onboarded.

data.html:
Frequently asked questions

Let’s set your mind at ease.

Can’t find the answer you’re looking for? Reach out to our customer support team.

Is pricing really this simple?

There are a few states that require a registration fee; however, most states are free. The only recurring charge is your monthly, quarterly, or annual filings. For Pro (custom) plans, please schedule a time with a member of our team.

Can Numeral help me with back taxes?

Yes, we’ll complete a full audit of your store and discuss your options. We can help initiate a Voluntary Disclosure Agreement (VDA) or suggest alternatives like backfiling.

Do we have to sign a long-term contract?

Clients pay month to month when we file taxes and/or register them in a state.

What assurances does Numeral make for clients?

We guarantee that your sales tax is filed on time, or we'll pay for your penalties and interest charges.

What’s the general timeline and next steps to get sales tax compliant?

We’ll complete a comprehensive audit of your business. Based on our results, we can help register your business in the appropriate states and backfile your sales tax. It often takes just a few days to get fully onboarded.
